name: 거지 키우기
description:
Save a dime and have everything in the world!
(Real estate, art, enterprise, city, planet)

- Increasing the level of the stowage increases the gold per tab.
- If you hire Alba, the part-timers will make money!
- Buy and resell a variety of assets to increase your wealth by capital gains!
- There are a variety of asset cards and cartoon cards. Gather all your cards!

Well, have a good time!
